articles.title: Niemann Compares Himself To Fischer After Winning Tournament By 3 Points - Chess.com
articles.description: GM Hans Niemann won the historic Tournament of Peace 2023 in Zagreb on Thursday by a massive three-point margin ahead of the field.With a 2946 performance rating, the 20-year-old American player score
